description: This is a test class for the NoteController in a Spring Boot application. It contains unit tests for creating, listing, retrieving, and deleting notes via REST API endpoints, utilizing MockMvc for mock HTTP requests.

classes.name: NoteControllerTests
classes.description: A JUnit test class for testing the NoteController endpoints, verifying behavior for creating, listing, retrieving, and deleting notes.

methods.name: validationErrorOnCreate
methods.description: Test to verify validation error response when creating a note with invalid data (empty title).

methods.name: createAndListAndGetAndDelete
methods.description: Test that creates a note, lists notes, retrieves the created note, and deletes it, verifying each step's response.
